attributes.additional_details:
This petition is being set up in order for the people to show their support in regards to Marine A.

This petition is to show the people who do not agree with the punishment that Marine A is being given.

We, the people, demand that the charges against Marine A be dropped. Marine A fought and endured a lot for his country, regardless of the so called questionable circumstances in which he operated, he does not deserve to be locked away.

The government and judicial system has let Marine A down, the people will not.
